Description: Hardier then average and with some resistance to poison. Stout Halflings are also said to have dwarven blood.
Vision: Standard: Need a Torch or magic to see in the Dark
raceAbilities: Lucky: When you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw. You can reroll the die and must use the new roll.
Brace: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened
Halfling Nimbleness: You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger then yours.
Stout Resilience: You have advantage on saving throws against Poison, and you have resistance against Poison Damage.
